settings.title: Leaderboard Settings
settings.description: Control how you appear on public leaderboards. Your privacy is important to us.
settings.gdprDescription: Leaderboards are opt-in only. When visible, only your first name (or alias) and location are shown. No photos, last names, or profile links are ever displayed.
settings.visibleDescription: You're visible on leaderboards. Others can see your rank and XP.
settings.hiddenDescription: You're hidden from all leaderboards. Toggle on to compete publicly.
settings.whatOthersSee: What others will see on the leaderboard:
settings.displayNamePlaceholder: Leave empty to use your first name
settings.displayNameHint: Use an alias for extra privacy. If empty, your first name will be shown.
settings.locationHint: Your location determines which regional leaderboards you appear on.
